block.p: GREENBERG-Theodore. Age 76. Died after a long illness. Of Brooklyn, NY, and Boca Raton, FL. Beloved husband of Ruth. Loving father of Ellen & Howard. Fatherin-law of Marty and Ellen. Loving grandfather of Gabrielle, Corey, Kate, Brian and Adam. Loving great-grandfather of Morgan, Sarah and Stephanie. Funeral services will be held Sunday, June 4, 11:30 AM, at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 W. 76th St, NYC. Burial services wil be at Wellwood Cemetery, Farmingdale, LI, immediately following funeral service. In lieu of flowers please send donations to Cancer Care of N.Y.
